div1.p: Havard introduces Caldas, a Brazilian scientist who is coming to Havana for experiments on yellow fever.

div1.head: Military Orders regarding Philippe Caldas, August 1901
div1.p:
CIVIL DIVISION
DEPARTMENT OF CUBA
Rec'd 8-17 1901

HEADQUARTERS DEPARTMENT OF CUBA,
OFFICE OF THE CHIEF SURGEON.

Note introducing Dr. Felipe
Caldas, a Brazilian scientist
who comes to Havana to make ex-
periments on yellow fever.

(Note from Brazilian Consul-Gen-
eral at Washington also enclosed)

OFFICE OF THE MILITARY GOVERNOR
Havana, August 17, 1901

TO THE CHIEF SURGEON
OF THE DEPARTMENT

HEADQUARTERS DEPARTMENT OF CUBA,
Office of the Chief Surgeon,
Havana, September 4, 1901.

Respectfully returned to the
Adjutant General of the Department,
contents noted.

V. Havard
Major, Surgeon, U. S. Army,
Chief Surgeon.

Headquarters Department of Cuba,
Received SEP 7 1901
